shortDescription: Complete Units Page Modernization & Mobile-First Contacts Enhancement
problem: Legacy Units page architecture and non-optimized mobile experience for contacts management
cause: Old architecture patterns with legacy components and lack of mobile-first design principles across key user interfaces

solution.phase1: Created modern useUnitsPageState and useUnitsStats hooks for centralized state management and comprehensive statistics
solution.phase2: Migrated Units page from legacy components to modern server component architecture with proper async/await patterns
solution.phase3: Enhanced all page components (Buildings, Contacts, Projects) with ListContainer integration and consistent patterns
solution.phase4: Improved navigation components (app-sidebar, sidebar-menu-item) and refined Units components for better UX
solution.phase5: Optimized ContactsHeader for mobile with styled-jsx and specialized CSS, enhanced ContactListItem responsiveness

testing: TypeScript compilation verified, mobile responsive behavior tested, all page components follow modern React patterns, navigation system works correctly
notes: Complete Units page architecture modernization with full legacy component removal
Established reusable ListContainer pattern for consistent page layouts across entire application
All page components now follow enterprise-grade React patterns with proper state management
Mobile-first approach implemented for contacts management with specialized CSS and styled-jsx
Navigation system enhanced with improved sidebar functionality and better user experience
Component structure standardized across all major page components (Units, Buildings, Contacts, Projects)
Claude settings updated with comprehensive permissions for efficient development workflow
Foundation established for future page migrations following the same modernization pattern
Enhanced UnifiedHeaderSystem with improved component flexibility for various use cases
